Specials & Events
Happy
hour
Daily 3pm to 6pm
Featured beverage specials and $7 bar bites at the Reef & Grill and Snook Deck
View Menu
Marina Monday
Mondays 3pm to 6pm
At the Snook Deck every Monday 3pm to close only for Safe Harbor Regatta Pointe Marina community and guests
$3 Domestic Drafts & Bottles
$4 Well Mixers
$5 House Margaritas
$12 Burgers & Baskets
See special menu for full details. Snook Deck hours subject to weather. Promotion runs through the end of 2025
Taco TUesday
all day tuesdays
A new fan favorite, enjoy $12 taco flights and $7 house margaritas at the Reef & Grill
View Menu
Wine Wednesday
wednesdays 3pm to 9pm
$9 bottles of house wine and 50% off all bottles every Wednesday from 3pm to 9pm on the ground floor
Book a Table
Sunday Brunch
sundays 11am to 2:30pm
Brunch specials menu available at the Reef & Grill every Sunday 11am to 2:30pm
VIEW MENU
BOOK A TABLE
Live Music
at the SNook Deck
Live acoustic from local musicians at the Snook Deck every Friday and Saturday evening
Live Piano
On the second Floor
Live piano on the Second Floor every Friday evening 5:30pm to 9pm

Private Events
Host your next event
on our Second Floor
Our private event spaces are designed to host special celebrations and large group gatherings such as showers, rehearsal dinners, reunions, seminars, luncheons, and the list goes on. All three of our event spaces feature waterfront views, our onsite culinary team, wireless internet access, custom bar and menu packages, and are handicap accessible.
Inquire
The Palmetto Room
Seats up to 40 guests and features rectangle tables and an 80” television screen
The Riverfront Room
Seats up to 40 guests and features round tables and sits in the center of our second floor with floor to ceiling windows offering a unique view overlooking the river
For larger groups of up to 80 guests
The Second Floor dining space
features beautiful wood tables with comfortable seating and breathtaking water views
Private Events
Our Events Manager
can’t wait to meet you
If you’re wondering whether or not a private event space is right for you, please fill out our inquiry form and our events manager will be happy to guide you in the right direction.
Inquire
